text: Ama mopafina witimo'a rama'a nehanigeno, agonafinena witimo'a hageno, marerino umase emase hanie. Lebanoni zafaramimo'ma nehiaza huno zafa ragamo'a knare huno renentenigeno, ran kumapima nemaniza vahe'mofo nomani'zamo'a tra'zama hageno tretre hiankna huno, knare'za huno afovage huno tretre hugahie.
